abstract: Though Coca-Cola’s market share has slipped, it is still the world’s leading carbonated cola. Coke is far ahead of Pepsi in much of Europe and South America, but Pepsi dominates in some Asian markets.
snippet: Though Coca-Cola’s market share has slipped, it is still the world’s leading carbonated cola. Coke is far ahead of Pepsi in much of Europe and South America, but Pepsi dominates in some Asian markets.

headline.main: I’d Like to Sell the World a Coke
